select
from trade_order where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and status='WAITING' union all select

from trade_order where status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR} and send_status = 'WAIT' and update_date < now()-interval 20 second limit 10

from trade_order where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} for update
